title: Echo Block
summaries: The Echo Block is a block which turns completely invisible once placed. It is sold by the Cyborg NPC for 10 when he is spoken to in a Graveyard. Once placed, the Echo Block cannot be seen by the player unless they have the Spectre Goggles equipped (purchasable for 10 under the same conditions).
Echo Blocks work similarly to most blocks as they can be hammered, actuated with an Actuator, and stood on or used to hoik.
